featured.title: FEATURED PROJECT
featured.stay-hydrated-desc: Minimalist water intake reminder for Android.

privacy.title: Private
privacy.description: No ads, no tracking, and no bloatware.

description.paragraph-1: Most water tracker apps are bloated or require an internet connection just to log a glass of water.
description.paragraph-1-continue: Stay Hydrated is built differently; it follows a user-first approach, and that's why users loved it from day one. No intrusive permissions, no ads, nothing you and I hate.
description.paragraph-2: It features a minimal and focused UI designed to get out of your way. Beyond standard tracking, it offers extra features including:

features.health-desc: Built-in weight tracking, BMI calculation, and height-for-age charts.
features.guidance-desc: Guidance based on your activity and personal goals.
features.customizations-desc: Theming, flexible reminder schedules, unit systems and more.
features.backup-desc: Optional secure Google Drive backups for Star Members.

contribution.title: Community Contribution
contribution.paragraph: Thanks to the incredible support from dozens of volunteer contributors around the world, Stay Hydrated has been fully translated into over 10 languages.

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.statement: We don't collect your data, period.

data-storage.title: Definition of "your data" and the way we store it
data-storage.paragraph-1: Your data is stored only in the internal storage of your device. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.

list.intro: The data that Stay Hydrated may store includes:
list.item-2: Your gender, height, and date of birth

google-services.title: Services provided by Google LLC
google-services.paragraph: For Google Drive, Stay Hydrated requests your permission to create a hidden app-specific folder in your account. This way, you can back up your data without compromising your privacy. For Google Fit, read and write access to nutrition and body info is requested. These permissions are needed to sync your water intake, height, and weight records. Please note that you accept Google's relevant terms of service and privacy statements by using these services.

changes.title: Changes to this privacy notice
changes.paragraph: We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy notice at any time, with or without notice to users. However, we also promise that we will never collect your personal data and share it with third parties without your consent. By using Stay Hydrated, you acknowledge that you understand and agree to the terms of this privacy statement.

footnotes.1: Exact app name may differ from region to region.
footnotes.2: Stay Hydrated may be referred to as “we”, “us” or “(this) app”.
